sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-table :data="dataset" :row-class-name="tableRowClassName" style="width: 100%; height: 100%">
    <el-table-column prop="time" label="时间" width="180" align="center"/>
    <el-table-column prop="value" label="值" width="180" align="center"/>
    <el-table-column prop="isSafed" label="是否超出国家限值" align="center"/>
  </el-table>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    props: ['dataset'],
    methods: {
      tableRowClassName({row}) {
        if (row.isSafed === "安全") {
          return 'success-row';
        } else {
          return 'warning-row';
        }
      }
    },
  }
</script>

<style>
.el-table .seccess-row {
  background: black;
}

.el-table .warning-row {
  background: red;
}


</style>
